title: Modem/radio seems to not work
content: My pixel 3 xl is having issues with sending sms and calling on lte but if I switch to 3g it has no data but calling and sms work. along with not being able to turn on the WiFi at all I check and there is no MAC address and some times no IP... Help me please I love my phone, I love google, but I am not able to utilize either at the moment...does someone know of a firmware flash and what are the procedures
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3 XL
